vcluster.elements

Class Vm

  • java.lang.Object
    • vcluster.elements.Vm

  • public class Vm
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a virtual machine

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vm()
      Constructor, initialize an instance of virtual machine as the default members' value.

      • isIdle

        public int isIdle()
        Get the activity status of the virtual machine,idle or busy.
        Returns:
        isIdle, the value is a integer number, 0 represents idle, 1 represents busy and 3 represents vcluster failed to get the information.

      • setIsIdle

        public void setIsIdle(int isIdle)
        Set the activity status of the virtual machine,idle or busy.
        Parameters:
        isIdle, - the value is a integer number, 0 represents idle, 1 represents busy and 3 represents vcluster failed to get the information.
